abstract.t: This document defines the WebSocket mapping for scalability protocols.

section.title: Underlying protocol
section.t: This mapping should be layered on the top of WebSocket protocol as defined in RFC 6455.

section.title: Message
section.t: SP message maps directly to WebSocket message. The message can be fragmented as needed. Frame boundaries are ignored by the SP layer.

section.title: IANA Considerations
section.t: This memo includes no request to IANA.

section.title: Security Considerations
section.t: The mapping isn't intended to provide any additional security in addition to what WebSocket does. DoS concerns are addressed within the specification.
